chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType
d: dstatelet
C: LockCoh d

Goal:
n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == server then exists ss : server_state, getLocal n d = st :-> ss else n \in clients /\ (exists cs : client_state, getLocal n d = st :-> cs))

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
Notation valid := @PCM.valid
nodes = [:: server] ++ clients : seq nid
Inductive client_state : Set := NotHeld : client_state | Held : nat -> client_state Arguments Held _%nat_scope
nid = nat : Set
st = ptr_nat 1 : ptr
LockCoh = CohPred (CohPredMixin l1 l2 l3) : Coherence.cohpred (fun=> [eta nodes])
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
Notation seq := list
Record server_state : Set := ServerState { outstanding : seq nid; current_epoch : nat; current_holder : option nid } Arguments ServerState _%seq_scope _%nat_scope
local_coh = fun n : nid => [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == server then exists ss : server_state, server_local_coh ss h else n \in clients /\ (exists cs : client_state, client_local_coh cs h))] : nid -> Simpl_Pred (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
state_coh = fun d : dstatelet => forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> local_coh n (getLocal n d) : dstatelet -> Prop
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
finfun.fun_of_fin : finfun.finfun_of ?ph -> forall x : fintype.Finite.eqType ?aT, ?rT x where ?aT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d |- fintype.Finite.type] ?rT : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d |- fintype.Finite.sort ?aT -> Type] ?ph : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d |- phant (forall x : fintype.Finite.sort ?aT, ?rT x)]
client_nodes : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in clients -> n \in nodes
client_not_server : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in clients -> (n == server) = false
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
coh_msg = fun (pkt : msg TaggedMessage) (e : nat_eqType) => if from pkt == server then to pkt \in clients /\ msg_from_server (content pkt) e else if from pkt \in clients then to pkt == server /\ msg_from_client (content pkt) else False : msg TaggedMessage -> nat_eqType -> Prop
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d |- Type]
server_local_coh = fun ss : server_state => [Pred h | h = st : -> ss] : server_state -> Simpl_Pred heapUMC
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
server_send_step = fun (ss : server_state) (to : nid) => if to \in clients then match outstanding ss with | [::] => ss | _ :: out' => {| outstanding := out'; current_epoch := (current_epoch ss).+1; current_holder := Some to |} end else ss : server_state -> nid -> server_state
client_local_coh = fun cs : client_state => [Pred h | h = st : -> cs] : client_state -> Simpl_Pred heapUMC
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
subnKC : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> m + (n - m) = n
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
leq = fun m n : nat => m - n == 0 : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments leq (_ _)%nat_scope
addnC = fun m n : nat => (fun _evar_0_ : m + (n + 0) = n + m => eq_ind (n + 0) (fun _pattern_value_ : nat => m + _pattern_value_ = n + m) _evar_0_ n (addn0 n)) ((fun _evar_0_ : n + (m + 0) = n + m => eq_ind_r (eq^~ (n + m)) _evar_0_ (addnCA m n 0)) ((fun _evar_0_ : n + m = n + m => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : nat => n + _pattern_value_ = n + m) _evar_0_ (addn0 m)) (erefl (n + m)))) : commutative addn
addn1 : forall n : nat, n + 1 = n.+1
subnDA : forall m n p : nat, n - (m + p) = n - m - p
leq_subLR : forall m n p : nat, (m - n <= p) = (m <= n + p)
heap_eta : forall (x : ptr) (h : heap), x \in dom h -> exists (A : Type) (v : A), find x h = Some (idyn v) /\ h = x : -> v \+ free x h
leqnn : forall n : nat, n <= n
subSn : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> n.+1 - m = (n - m).+1
addSnnS : forall m n : nat, m.+1 + n = m + n.+1
leq_addr : forall m n : nat, n <= n + m
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
subn_gt0 : forall m n : nat, (0 < n - m) = (m < n)
bigop.mem_index_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in bigop.index_iota m n) = (m <= i < n)
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
addn0 = fun n : nat => [eta eqP] ((fun _evar_0_ : (fun n0 : nat => is_true (n0 + 0 == n0)) 0 => (nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => n0 + 0 == n0) _evar_0_)^~ n) (eqxx 0) (fun n0 : nat => id)) : right_id 0 addn
mem_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in iota m n) = (m <= i < m + n)
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
coh_dom_upd : forall (this : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (s : heap), this \in nodes -> LockCoh d -> dom (upd this s (dstate d)) =i nodes
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh

```proof
intros n d C Hn.
split.
- apply (state_coh _ _ C Hn).
- destruct (n == server) eqn:Heq.
  + exists ss.
    rewrite (eqP Heq).
    reflexivity.
  + split.
    * apply client_nodes, client_not_server, Heq.
    * destruct (getLocal n d) as [cs|ss] eqn: Hget.
      { exists cs. reflexivity. }
      { exfalso. apply (Hnin n). apply (coh_dom_upd n d). apply Hn. apply C. }
Qed```

original: proof intros n d C Hn. split. - apply (state_coh _ _ C Hn). - destruct (n == server) eqn:Heq. + exists ss. rewrite (eqP Heq). reflexivity. + split. * apply client_nodes, client_not_server, Heq. * destruct (getLocal n d) as [cs|ss] eqn: Hget. { exists cs. reflexivity. } { exfalso. apply (Hnin n). apply (coh_dom_upd n d). apply Hn. apply C. } Qed.
